mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.weixiuyuan_name as weixiuyuanName ,a.weixiuyuan_photo as weixiuyuanPhoto ,a.weixiuyuan_phone as weixiuyuanPhone ,a.weixiuyuan_id_number as weixiuyuanIdNumber ,a.weixiuyuan_email as weixiuyuanEmail ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.weixiuyuan_delete as weixiuyuanDelete ,a.weixiuyuan_time as weixiuyuanTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM weixiuyuan a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.weixiuyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiuyuanName},'%')
and a.weixiuyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiuyuanPhone},'%')
and a.weixiuyuan_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiuyuanIdNumber},'%')
and a.weixiuyuan_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.weixiuyuanEmail},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.weixiuyuan_delete >= #{params.weixiuyuanDeleteStart}
and a.weixiuyuan_delete <= #{params.weixiuyuanDeleteEnd}
and a.weixiuyuan_delete = #{params.weixiuyuanDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.weixiuyuan_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.weixiuyuanTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.weixiuyuan_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.weixiuyuanTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
